title: top4 Lb 0.991 score:  actually GRU >> LSTM
description: TL; DRThis update Ashish Patel(阿希什) kernel https://www.kaggle.com/ashishpatel26/cuda-dnn-lstm-stacked-model-99 I'am replace LSTM cell to GRU  This is just a simple fork from Wiston Van's basic LSTM model https://www.kaggle.com/winstonvan/the-van-plan-for-kaggle-swaggle We slapped an Attention layer on top of the LSTM results, also we leave the prediction probabilites alone instead of rounding it. Anyway, Happy Thanks Giving! Don't forget upvote :{
